name: Lost Continent
description:
In the lost continent, monsters appear, and the whole continent is in panic.

You bravely accept the king's highest reward task

Defeat the final monster and give the spoils to the king

Caution: some monsters will attack you suddenly, so be prepared

There are treasure boxes on the map. Make good use of them

Equipment system



Equipment is divided into weapon, shield, head, clothing and ornament

If you have enough money, you can buy it

It can be equipped directly without any restrictions



Props system



The props are mainly healing potions

If you have enough money, you can buy it.



Monster system



Monsters only appear in the field map. There are no monsters in the city.

Monsters don't show up on the map. Walking on the road will trigger a fight

There will only be one monster

As long as the purchase of equipment can easily overcome
